      • Public Function CombineTwoArr(arr1, arr2)

        Public Function CombineTwoArr(arr1, arr2)
        Details:

        'Public Function GetColumnsIndexes(Range As Range, ColumnNamesArr() As String)
        ' On Error GoTo Err_GetColumnsIndexes
        '
        ' Dim HeaderRow As Range: Set HeaderRow = Range.rows(1)
        ' Dim i As Integer, j As Long
        ' Dim tempPositions() As Long
        ' ReDim tempPositions(0 To UBound(ColumnNamesArr))
        ' For i = LBound(ColumnNamesArr) To UBound(ColumnNamesArr)
        ' For j = 1 To HeaderRow.Columns.count
        ' If Trim(HeaderRow.Columns(j).Value) = Trim(ColumnNamesArr(i)) Then
        ' tempPositions(i) = j
        ' Exit For
        ' End If
        ' Next j
        ' Next i
        ' GetColumnsIndexes = tempPositions
        '
        ' Exit Function
        'Err_GetColumnsIndexes:
        ' MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Error occured in GetColumnsIndexes"
        'End Function
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : CombineTwoArr
        '* Description : Combine value of two array.
        '* Created : 08-12-2013 18:33
        '* Modified: 08-12-2013 18:33
        '* 07-20-2014 12:02 Fix for IssueID: 2622 Note: This Macro is DISCONTINUED from 1.24 and onwards. All Prior releases need this fix for IssueID:
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
